00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RImageDiffRect"

00023 #include "rimagediffrect.h"
00024 #include "imgdiffs.h"

00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00027 
00028     RDK2_FACTORY(RImageDiffRect);
00029 
00030 RImageDiffRect::RImageDiffRect(
00031     RImage* image, int left, int top, int width, int height) 
00032 :
00033     ObjectDiff("RImage"), rectLeft(left), rectTop(top), rectWidth(width), 
00034     rectHeight(height), refImageWidth(image->getWidth()), 
00035     refImageHeight(image->getHeight()), refImageType(image->getType()),
00036     buffer(0), rows(0)
00037 {
00038     if (left + width > image->getWidth()) 
00039         rectWidth = image->getWidth() - left;
00040     if (top + height > image->getHeight()) 
00041         rectHeight = image->getHeight() - top;
00042     if (rectWidth < 0 || rectHeight < 0) 
00043         return; // FIXME occhio, buffer non inizializzato; eccezione?
00044     initBuffer(rectWidth, rectHeight, image->getType());
00045     copyRect(image->getBuffer(), top, left, rectWidth, rectHeight, image->getType());
00046 }
00047 
00048 RImageDiffRect::RImageDiffRect(
00049     RImageDiffRect* imageDiffRect, int left, int top, int width, int height) 
00050 :
00051     ObjectDiff("RImage"), rectLeft(left), rectTop(top), rectWidth(width),
00052     rectHeight(height),
00053     refImageWidth(imageDiffRect->refImageWidth), 
00054     refImageHeight(imageDiffRect->refImageHeight),
00055     refImageType(imageDiffRect->refImageType), buffer(0), rows(0)
00056 {
00057     if (left + width > imageDiffRect->rectWidth) 
00058         rectWidth = imageDiffRect->rectWidth - left;
00059     if (top + height > imageDiffRect->rectHeight) 
00060         rectHeight = imageDiffRect->rectHeight - top;
00061     if (rectWidth < 0 || rectHeight < 0) 
00062         return; // FIXME occhio, buffer non inizializzato; eccezione?
00063     initBuffer(rectWidth, rectHeight, imageDiffRect->refImageType);
00064     uint8_t* px = imageDiffRect->buffer;
00065     copyRect(px, top, left, rectWidth, rectHeight, imageDiffRect->refImageType);
00066 }
00067 
00068 RImageDiffRect::RImageDiffRect() :
00069     ObjectDiff("RImage"), rectLeft(0), rectTop(0), rectWidth(0), rectHeight(0),
00070     refImageWidth(0), refImageHeight(0), refImageType(RImage::C8),
00071     buffer(0), rows(0)
00072 { }
00073 
00074 uint8_t** RImageDiffRect::getPixels()
00075 {
00076     cBuf.clear();   // if someone modify the pixels, cBuf becomes invalid
00077     return rows;
00078 }
00079 
00080 uint8_t* RImageDiffRect::getBuffer()
00081 {
00082     cBuf.clear();   // if someone modify the pixels, cBuf becomes invalid
00083     return buffer;
00084 }
00085 
00086 RDK2::Object* RImageDiffRect::clone() const
00087 {
00088     RImageDiffRect* newDiff = new RImageDiffRect(*this);
00089     return newDiff; // FIXME
00090     newDiff->buffer = 0;    // this avoids initBuffer to delete MY buffer
00091     newDiff->rows = 0;  // this avoids initBuffer to delete MY buffer
00092     newDiff->initBuffer(newDiff->rectWidth, newDiff->rectHeight, newDiff->refImageType);
00093     newDiff->copyRect(this->buffer, 0, 0, rectWidth, rectHeight, newDiff->refImageType);
00094     return newDiff;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void RImageDiffRect::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00098 {
00099     r->startReading(getClassName());
00100         objectClassName = r->readString();
00101         rectLeft = r->read_i32();
00102         rectTop = r->read_i32();
00103         rectWidth = r->read_i32();
00104         rectHeight = r->read_i32();
00105         refImageWidth = r->read_i32();
00106         refImageHeight = r->read_i32();
00107         refImageType = (RImage::Type) r->read_i32();
00108         initBuffer(rectWidth, rectHeight, refImageType);
00109         uint8_t* readBuffer;
00110         size_t readLen;
00111         r->readBytes((void**)&readBuffer, &readLen);
00112         cBuf.assign(readBuffer, readBuffer + readLen);
00113         uncompressImgDiffCBuf(cBuf, this);
00114     r->doneReading();
00115 }
00116 
00117 void RImageDiffRect::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00118 {
00119     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00120         w->writeString(objectClassName);
00121         w->write_i32(rectLeft);
00122         w->write_i32(rectTop);
00123         w->write_i32(rectWidth);
00124         w->write_i32(rectHeight);
00125         w->write_i32(refImageWidth);
00126         w->write_i32(refImageHeight);
00127         w->write_i32(refImageType);
00128         if (cBuf.empty()) {
00129             RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Compressed buffer is empty, (re)compressing");
00130             for (int y = 0; y < rectHeight; y++) {
00131                 vector<uint8_t> cLine;
00132                 compressImgLine(refImageType, rows, y, rectWidth, cLine);
00133                 cBuf.insert(cBuf.end(), cLine.begin(), cLine.end());
00134             }
00135         }
00136         w->writeBytes(&(cBuf[0]), cBuf.size());
00137     w->doneWriting();
00138 }
00139 
00140 // FIXME assumo che, per qualunque immagine, almeno una riga entra dentro un buffer di lunghezza maxBufferSize
00141 // se questo non dovesse essere vero, viene creato comunque un diff con buffer contenente una riga
00142 vector<ObjectDiff*> RImageDiffRect::split(size_t maxBufferSize)
00143 {
00144     vector<ObjectDiff*> ret;
00145     vector<uint8_t> cLine;
00146     vector<uint8_t> cBuf;
00147     int startY = 0;
00148     for (int y = 0; y < rectHeight; y++) {
00149         compressImgLine(refImageType, rows, y, rectWidth, cLine);
00150         if (cBuf.size() + cLine.size() > maxBufferSize) {
00151             RImageDiffRect* newDiff = new RImageDiffRect(this, 0, startY, rectWidth, y - startY);
00152             newDiff->cBuf.assign(cBuf.begin(), cBuf.end());
00153             if (cBuf.size() > 0) ret.push_back(newDiff);
00154             startY = y;
00155             cBuf.clear();
00156         }
00157         cBuf.insert(cBuf.end(), cLine.begin(), cLine.end());
00158         cLine.clear();
00159     }
00160     if (cBuf.size() > 0) {
00161         RImageDiffRect* newDiff = new RImageDiffRect(this, 0, startY, rectWidth, rectHeight - startY);
00162         newDiff->cBuf.assign(cBuf.begin(), cBuf.end());
00163         ret.push_back(newDiff);
00164     }
00165     return ret;
00166 }
00167 
00168 RImageDiffRect::~RImageDiffRect()
00169 {
00170     delete[] buffer;
00171     delete[] rows;
00172 }
00173 
00174 void RImageDiffRect::initBuffer(int width, int height, RImage::Type type)
00175 {
00176     rectWidth = width;
00177     rectHeight = height;
00178     refImageType = type;
00179     
00180     int pixsize=RImage::getBytesPerPixel(type);
00181     int size=width*height*pixsize;
00182     int sizerow=width*pixsize;
00183 
00184     delete[] buffer;
00185     delete[] rows;
00186 
00187     buffer=new uint8_t[size];
00188     rows=new uint8_t*[height];
00189     
00190     for (int i=0;i<height;i++) rows[i]=buffer+sizerow*i;
00191     cBuf.clear();
00192 }
00193

00201     }*/
